spirit:component.spirit:name: SpaceWire_Light_AXI4

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_INTR_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: C S AXI INTR DATA WIDTH

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_INTR_ADDR_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: C S AXI INTR ADDR WIDTH

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_INTR_SENSITIVITY
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Each bit corresponds to Sensitivity of interrupt : 0 - EDGE, 1 - LEVEL

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_INTR_ACTIVE_STATE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Each bit corresponds to Sub-type of INTR: [0 - FALLING_EDGE, 1 - RISING_EDGE : if C_INTR_SENSITIVITY is EDGE(0)] and [ 0 - LEVEL_LOW, 1 - LEVEL_LOW : if C_INTR_SENSITIVITY is LEVEL(1) ]

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_IRQ_ACTIVE_STATE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Sub-type of IRQ: [0 - FALLING_EDGE, 1 - RISING_EDGE : if C_IRQ_SENSITIVITY is EDGE(0)] and [ 0 - LEVEL_LOW, 1 - LEVEL_LOW : if C_IRQ_SENSITIVITY is LEVEL(1) ]

spirit:component.spirit:description: SpaceWire Light by OpenCores bridge to AXI4 compatible with Zynq 7

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_INTR_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: C S AXI INTR DATA WIDTH

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_INTR_ADDR_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: C S AXI INTR ADDR WIDTH

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_INTR_SENSITIVITY
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Each bit corresponds to Sensitivity of interrupt : 0 - EDGE, 1 - LEVEL

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_INTR_ACTIVE_STATE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Each bit corresponds to Sub-type of INTR: [0 - FALLING_EDGE, 1 - RISING_EDGE : if C_INTR_SENSITIVITY is EDGE(0)] and [ 0 - LEVEL_LOW, 1 - LEVEL_LOW : if C_INTR_SENSITIVITY is LEVEL(1) ]

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_IRQ_ACTIVE_STATE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Sub-type of IRQ: [0 - FALLING_EDGE, 1 - RISING_EDGE : if C_IRQ_SENSITIVITY is EDGE(0)] and [ 0 - LEVEL_LOW, 1 - LEVEL_LOW : if C_IRQ_SENSITIVITY is LEVEL(1) ]
